entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:13 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
